column5: Heading up to the area June 9th-13th. We will be staying at Deer Path Lodge and using the Deception Bay landing. We will be fishing the Manitou Rapids area and Sein Bay. Wondering if anyone has any fishing reports for the area. Thanks, Otts
I will be at Deer Path on June 4-11. Tan and Maroon Alumacraft with Minnesota plates. jimbo
